# Pull Request Template

## PR Title

*   **Describe your changes in a concise title.**
*   **Format:** `[Type] Short description of changes` (e.g., `[Feat] Implement PDF parsing module`)

## PR Description

*   **What does this PR do?**
*   **Why is this change necessary?**
*   **How has this been tested?**

## Checklist

*   [ ] I have read and understood the **CONTRIBUTING.md** guidelines.
*   [ ] My code follows the project's coding standards and conventions.
*   [ ] I have added/updated relevant unit tests.
*   [ ] I have updated the documentation if necessary.
*   [ ] I have run the linters and formatters (`ruff check --fix`, `ruff format`).
*   [ ] I have ensured the CI pipeline (`ci.yml`) will pass.
*   [ ] My changes do not introduce breaking changes or have been clearly documented as such.
*   [ ] My PR title and description are clear and concise.

## Related Issues

*   Closes #issue-number (if applicable)
*   Relates to #issue-number (if applicable)

## Notes for Reviewer

*   Any specific areas you'd like the reviewer to focus on?
*   Any dependencies or environment considerations?
